pr_title: Add support to register AnnotatedFieldHandler in decoder

timeline.author: vkryachko

timeline.bodyText: by convention static fields use UPPER_SNAKE_CASE, please change here and throughout.
timeline.author: vkryachko

timeline.bodyText: It does not look like having this method be generic adds much type safety for implementers of the interface, otoh it makes it impossible to write implementation as lambda expressions, should be drop the <T> generic argument from the signature?
timeline.author: vkryachko

replies.author: James201311

replies.bodyText: it should be possible to use the lambda in the register() method as it has the annotation type as first argument, but not possible to do it in the case of Map<? extends Annotation, Handler<?>> - which is fine as it is an internal implementation detail and should not be used directly anywhere
replies.author: vkryachko

timeline.author: vkryachko

timeline.message: Add support to register AnnotatedFieldHandler in decoder

timeline.bodyText: I assume this was not intended?
timeline.author: vkryachko
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@
-// Copyright 2020 Google LLC
+package com.google.firebase.decoders.json; // Copyright 2020 Google LLC
